name: pawmatch
description: 保護犬・保護猫とユーザーをマッチングするWebアプリケーション

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run api:build
scripts.deploy:workers: concurrently --names 'API,CRAWLER,DISPATCH,CONVERT' --prefix-colors 'yellow,cyan,magenta,green' 'npm run api:deploy' 'npm run crawler:deploy' 'npm run dispatcher:deploy' 'npm run converter:deploy'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:apps && npm run deploy:workers
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules app/node_modules api/node_modules crawler/node_modules converter/node_modules dispatcher/node_modules
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json app/node_modules app/package-lock.json api/node_modules api/package-lock.json crawler/node_modules crawler/package-lock.json converter/node_modules converter/package-lock.json dispatcher/node_modules dispatcher/package-lock.json
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:cache && npm run install:all
scripts.reinstall:quick: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../crawler && npm install && cd ../converter && npm install && cd ../dispatcher && npm install
